00028 #include <asm/system.h>

00030 #define atomic_xchg(ptr,v)       xchg(ptr,v)
00031 #define atomic_cmpxchg(ptr,o,n)  cmpxchg(ptr,o,n)
00032 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()  smp_mb()
00033 
00034 void atomic_set_mask(unsigned long mask, /* from arch/ppc/kernel/misc.S */
00035                      unsigned long *ptr);
00036 
00037 #define xnarch_atomic_set(pcounter,i)          atomic_set(pcounter,i)
00038 #define xnarch_atomic_get(pcounter)            atomic_read(pcounter)
00039 #define xnarch_atomic_inc(pcounter)            atomic_inc(pcounter)
00040 #define xnarch_atomic_dec(pcounter)            atomic_dec(pcounter)
00041 #define xnarch_atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)
00042 #define xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)
00043 #define xnarch_atomic_set_mask(pflags,mask)    atomic_set_mask(mask,pflags)
00044 #define xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(pflags,mask)  atomic_clear_mask(mask,pflags)

00048 #include <asm/ppc_asm.h>

00050 /*
00051  * Shamelessly lifted from <linux/asm-ppc/system.h>
00052  * and <linux/asm-ppc/atomic.h>
00053  */
00054 
00055 static inline unsigned long atomic_cmpxchg (volatile void *ptr,
00056                                             unsigned long o,
00057                                             unsigned long n)
00058 {
00059     unsigned long prev;
00060 
00061     __asm__ __volatile__ ("\n\
00062 1:      lwarx   %0,0,%2 \n\
00063         cmpw    0,%0,%3 \n\
00064         bne     2f \n"
00065         PPC405_ERR77(0,%2) \
00066 "       stwcx.  %4,0,%2 \n\
00067         bne-    1b\n"
00068 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00069 "       sync\n"
00070 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00071 "2:"
00072         : "=&r" (prev), "=m" (*(volatile unsigned long *)ptr)
00073         : "r" (ptr), "r" (o), "r" (n), "m" (*(volatile unsigned long *)ptr)
00074         : "cc", "memory");
00075 
00076     return prev;
00077 }
00078 
00079 static inline unsigned long atomic_xchg (volatile void *ptr,
00080                                          unsigned long x)
00081 {
00082     unsigned long prev;
00083 
00084     __asm__ __volatile__ ("\n\
00085 1:      lwarx   %0,0,%2 \n"
00086         PPC405_ERR77(0,%2) \
00087 "       stwcx.  %3,0,%2 \n\
00088         bne-    1b"
00089         : "=&r" (prev), "=m" (*(volatile unsigned long *)ptr)
00090         : "r" (ptr), "r" (x), "m" (*(volatile unsigned long *)ptr)
00091         : "cc", "memory");
00092 
00093     return prev;
00094 }
00095 
00096 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00097 #define SMP_SYNC  "sync"
00098 #define SMP_ISYNC "\n\tisync"
00099 #else /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00100 #define SMP_SYNC  ""
00101 #define SMP_ISYNC
00102 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00103 
00104 static __inline__ void atomic_inc(atomic_t *v)
00105 
00106 {
00107     int t;
00108 
00109     __asm__ __volatile__(
00110 "1:     lwarx   %0,0,%2\n\
00111         addic   %0,%0,1\n"
00112         PPC405_ERR77(0,%2)
00113 "       stwcx.  %0,0,%2 \n\
00114         bne-    1b"
00115         : "=&r" (t), "=m" (v->counter)
00116         : "r" (&v->counter), "m" (v->counter)
00117         : "cc");
00118 }
00119 
00120 static __inline__ int atomic_inc_return(atomic_t *v)
00121 
00122 {
00123     int t;
00124 
00125     __asm__ __volatile__(
00126 "1:     lwarx   %0,0,%1\n\
00127         addic   %0,%0,1\n"
00128         PPC405_ERR77(0,%1)
00129 "       stwcx.  %0,0,%1 \n\
00130         bne-    1b"
00131         SMP_ISYNC
00132         : "=&r" (t)
00133         : "r" (&v->counter)
00134         : "cc", "memory");
00135 
00136     return t;
00137 }
00138 
00139 static __inline__ void atomic_dec(atomic_t *v)
00140 
00141 {
00142     int t;
00143 
00144     __asm__ __volatile__(
00145 "1:     lwarx   %0,0,%2\n\
00146         addic   %0,%0,-1\n"
00147         PPC405_ERR77(0,%2)\
00148 "       stwcx.  %0,0,%2\n\
00149         bne-    1b"
00150         : "=&r" (t), "=m" (v->counter)
00151         : "r" (&v->counter), "m" (v->counter)
00152         : "cc");
00153 }
00154 
00155 static __inline__ int atomic_dec_return(atomic_t *v)
00156 
00157 {
00158     int t;
00159 
00160     __asm__ __volatile__(
00161 "1:     lwarx   %0,0,%1\n\
00162         addic   %0,%0,-1\n"
00163         PPC405_ERR77(0,%1)
00164 "       stwcx.  %0,0,%1\n\
00165         bne-    1b"
00166         SMP_ISYNC
00167         : "=&r" (t)
00168         : "r" (&v->counter)
00169         : "cc", "memory");
00170 
00171     return t;
00172 }
00173 
00174 static __inline__ void atomic_set_mask(unsigned long mask,
00175                                        unsigned long *ptr)
00176 {
00177     __asm__ __volatile__ ("\n\
00178 1:      lwarx   5,0,%0 \n\
00179         or      5,5,%1\n"
00180         PPC405_ERR77(0,%0) \
00181 "       stwcx.  5,0,%0 \n\
00182         bne-    1b"
00183         : /*no output*/
00184         : "r" (ptr), "r" (mask)
00185         : "r5", "cc", "memory");
00186 }
00187 
00188 static __inline__ void atomic_clear_mask(unsigned long mask,
00189                                          unsigned long *ptr)
00190 {
00191     __asm__ __volatile__ ("\n\
00192 1:      lwarx   5,0,%0 \n\
00193         andc    5,5,%1\n"
00194         PPC405_ERR77(0,%0) \
00195 "       stwcx.  5,0,%0 \n\
00196         bne-    1b"
00197         : /*no output*/
00198         : "r" (ptr), "r" (mask)
00199         : "r5", "cc", "memory");
00200 }
00201 
00202 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()  __asm__ __volatile__("": : :"memory")
00203 
00204 #define xnarch_atomic_set(pcounter,i)          (((pcounter)->counter) = (i))
00205 #define xnarch_atomic_get(pcounter)            ((pcounter)->counter)
00206 #define xnarch_atomic_inc(pcounter)            atomic_inc(pcounter)
00207 #define xnarch_atomic_dec(pcounter)            atomic_dec(pcounter)
00208 #define xnarch_atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)   (atomic_inc_return(pcounter) == 0)
00209 #define xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)   (atomic_dec_return(pcounter) == 0)
00210 #define xnarch_atomic_set_mask(pflags,mask)    atomic_set_mask(mask,pflags)
00211 #define xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(pflags,mask)  atomic_clear_mask(mask,pflags)
00212 
00213 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00214 
00215 typedef atomic_t atomic_counter_t;
00216 typedef unsigned long atomic_flags_t;
00217 
00218 #define xnarch_atomic_xchg(ptr,x) atomic_xchg(ptr,x)
